AboutPage.app-bar-description: During this year, I mainly works as <HighlightText>React and React Native</HighlightText> Developer to build the UI/UX of the app - A.LIFE (IOS / Android). It is a staff engagement app that promote Health & Wellness that is using by the <HighlightText>~500 employees</HighlightText> in FTLife and NWS holdings. Besides, I also work on the CMS system for the app by <HighlightText>Next.js</HighlightText>
AboutPage.aws-description: After quitting from my last job, I spent a few months studying for the AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate exam. I passed the exam on my first attempt and received my certification in January 2024. It helps me to understand the cloud computing concepts and services like the <HighlightText> classic load balancer</HighlightText>, <HighlightText>auto-scaling</HighlightText>, and the <HighlightText>serverless architecture.</HighlightText>
AboutPage.aws-title: Certification - AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate
AboutPage.description: Mid-level <HighlightText>Frontend</HighlightText> Developer with experience in building web and mobile app using <HighlightText>React, React Native, and TypeScript</HighlightText>. A team player with a strong ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams and effectively communicate technical concepts. Currently seeking opportunities in <HighlightText>Japan</HighlightText> to further contribute and grow
AboutPage.school-description: It was a fun time to study at HKUST. There is a lot of interesting people and courses. I have learned a lot of things from the basic electronics, programming, to the advanced machine learning, computer vision, and the AI. Study occupied most of my time, but I also joined an exchange program in HM Hochschule MÃ¼nchen University of Applied Sciences to meet new friends and learn the German. What's more, I got my <HighlightText>JLPT N3</HighlightText> in my final year which spark my interest in the Japanese language.
AboutPage.school-title: School - 1st class honor at Electronics Engineering in HKUST (Bachelor of Engineering)
AboutPage.talkbox-description: As my first full time job, I created my first launched project - Talent Management System for one of the biggest and recently built shopping mall <Link><HighlightText>Airside</HighlightText></Link> in Hong Kong. It is 47-story building with a mixed use of commercial workplace and shopping mall. I have practiced my <HighlightText>React</HighlightText> skills (in create-react-app) thoroughly on such a <HighlightText>complicated system</HighlightText> from the complex user authentication, role management, dashboard, rich text editor, to the various kinds of features.

Metadata.description: Calvin Yuen is a front-end developer based in Hong Kong. He is passionate about creating beautiful and functional websites.
Metadata.title: Calvin Yuen - Portfolio
